title: Adobe Converts Entire Type Library Into OpenType
content:
FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE   
   
   
Adobe Converts Entire Type Library Into OpenType   
   
   
First of Three Sets Released; InDesign Users to Benefit from Rich   
Typographic Capabilities   
   
SAN JOSE, Calif. - April 29, 2002 (NASDAQ: ADBE) - Adobe Systems   
Incorporated, the leader in network publishing, today announced that more   
than 650 converted Adobe® Type Library (ATL) fonts are now available in   
OpenType® format. The converted fonts will provide users with improved   
cross-platform document portability, simpler font management, and enhanced   
glyph coverage. Today
author: Jared Benson
